医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CDK9抑制剂：一种有前途的血液恶性肿瘤新疗法2023 年 8 月 7 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“CDK9 抑制剂：治疗血液恶性肿瘤的有前途的组合伙伴”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/CDK9-inhibitors-A-promising-new-treatment-for-hematological-malignancies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/CDK9-inhibitors-A-promising-new-treatment-for-hematological-malignancies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4fae518-b4a5-4cc6-a10a-93a2725dc03b Wed, 09 Aug 2023 16:09:11 -0400 CDK9 inhibitors: A promising new treatment for hematological malignancies
研究人员发现驱动学习的“潮起潮落”大脑机制研究人员长期以来一直认为，食物或金钱等奖励会导致“感觉良好”的激素多巴胺的释放，从而促进大脑的学习，多巴胺可以加强新信息的存储。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Researchers-discover-the-e28098ebb-flowe28099-brain-mechanism-that-drives-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Researchers-discover-the-e28098ebb-flowe28099-brain-mechanism-that-drives-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebf575fd-c4d5-4dba-a7ea-4f9b2c9ae066 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 16:00:09 -0400 Researchers discover the ‘ebb & flow’ brain mechanism that drives learning
耶鲁大学研究人员在活体小鼠体内创造“人性化”肝脏以研究慢性肝病耶鲁大学的研究人员在活体小鼠体内创造了一种功能性“人性化”肝脏，这将帮助科学家找到调节胆固醇水平的人类特异性机制，并有可能治疗困扰美国数千万人的慢性肝病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Yale-researchers-create- humanized-liver-in-living-mice-to-study-chronic-liver-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Yale-researchers-create- humanized-liver-in-living-mice-to-study-chronic-liver-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5693970-ced0-4c34-ae76-8521b65f5663 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 15:23:04 -0400 Yale researchers create "humanized" liver in living mice to study chronic liver diseases
皮肤细胞之间的 GABA 转移促进黑色素瘤的发生根据美国癌症研究协会期刊《Cancer Discovery》发表的结果，神经递质从一种类型的皮肤细胞转移到另一种类型的皮肤细胞（黑色素细胞到角质形成细胞）改变了电活动并促进了临床前模型中黑色素瘤的发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/GABA-transfer- Between-skin-cells-promotes-melanoma-initiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/GABA-transfer- Between-skin-cells-promotes-melanoma-initiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78dd08b9-479d-4fbe-9af5-7ce59aae1f40 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 15:19:20 -0400 GABA transfer between skin cells promotes melanoma initiation
Hmga1蛋白可能是骨质疏松症的重要治疗靶点发表在 FASEB 杂志上的新研究表明，增加特定基因的表达可能有助于预防与绝经后骨质疏松症相关的骨质流失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Hmga1- Protein-could-be-an-important-therapeutic-target-for-osteoporosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Hmga1- Protein-could-be-an-important-therapeutic-target-for-osteoporosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28aacc56-4f0f-4579-bf16-fa437491ae1a Wed, 09 Aug 2023 15:12:25 -0400 Hmga1 protein could be an important therapeutic target for osteoporosis
新工具可以识别有银屑病关节炎风险的银屑病患者在关节炎与风湿病学杂志上发表的研究中，研究人员开发并验证了一种名为 PRESTO 的工具，该工具可以识别银屑病患者，这些患者患银屑病关节炎的风险较高，因此可能受益于预防性治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/New-tool-can-identify-psoriasis-病人-at-risk-for-psoriatic-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/New-tool-can-identify-psoriasis-病人-at-risk-for-psoriatic-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaa689f0-b159-40f7-93cf-8165a9bb2c9c Wed, 09 Aug 2023 15:10:39 -0400 New tool can identify psoriasis patients at risk for psoriatic arthritis
缺乏TMCO3基因的小鼠骨骼缩短通过新一代测序，研究人员发现两姐妹身材矮小，其 TMCO3 基因存在突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Mice-lacking-TMCO3-gene-have-shortened-bones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Mice-lacking-TMCO3-gene-have-shortened-bones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0911e574-af6f-4c07-af41-5a802a08e621 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 15:06:36 -0400 Mice lacking TMCO3 gene have shortened bones
常用的天然气气味剂可能会引发一系列不良健康症状加味剂广泛用于天然气泄漏检测，但很少有研究探讨其对公共健康的潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Commonly-used-natural-gas-odorants-may-induce-a-range-of-adverse-health-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Commonly-used-natural-gas-odorants-may-induce-a-range-of-adverse-health-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd28d02b-11c6-48e7-92b9-ab3d3fb05e8e Wed, 09 Aug 2023 14:55:44 -0400 Commonly-used natural gas odorants may induce a range of adverse health symptoms
将微塑料引入接受手术的人的心脏组织中科学家们在任何地方寻找微塑料，他们都找到了它们——；食物、水、空气和人体的某些部位。但对不直接暴露于环境的最内部器官的检查仍然有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Micro Plastics-introduced-into-the-heart-tissues-of-people-who-underwent-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Micro Plastics-introduced-into-the-heart-tissues-of-people-who-underwent-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a635ef8-8d25-4b24-9213-f9f2799ca7d7 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 14:39:11 -0400 Microplastics introduced into the heart tissues of people who underwent surgery
母乳糖可能有助于预防产前感染母乳喂养长期以来一直被用作帮助新生儿保持健康并预防多种疾病的方法。但母乳中天然存在的某些糖也有助于在婴儿出生前预防感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Breastmilk-sugars-may-help-prevent-prenatal-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Breastmilk-sugars-may-help-prevent-prenatal-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c06654f3-a30b-42d9-bd0b-d783961922df Wed, 09 Aug 2023 14:28:51 -0400 Breastmilk sugars may help prevent prenatal infections
